name: Lucas Bech
description: Passionate coder and aspiring software developer studying at Syddansk Erhvervsskole.
about: Iâ€™ve always had an immense curiosity and I love a good challenge. I spend a significant amount of my spare time learning, exploring software development and coding. I am a data technician student specializing in programming and an aspiring software developer. I have a great passion for software development and a relentless drive to learn and improve. My main interests are science, philosophy and technology. My name is Lucas Bech, I'm 18 years old and a EUX data technician student at Syddansk Erhvervsskole in Odense, Denmark. Here I learn about servers, services, programming as well as other various useful tools for software development. At this time, I'm looking for an internship where I can put theory into practice and get real working experience. Naturally, I enjoy programming in my spare time - my other interests include science, philosophy and technology. I'm currently learning Vue.js and OpenGL.
